content:
Hi All,
I found clinfhir is not working,Please figure out this.
Thanks.
Hi - can you be more specific about the issue? It seems to load OK for me. What module is causing issues? (btw note that there is a separate stream for clinFHIR...
@David Hay clinFHIR ValueSet Editor is working fine,Thank you.

Hi there. I just got introduced to Clinfhir by @Viet Nguyen at devday 2018. I think it has a lot of potiential for our business system analysts. I just connected it to our our FHIR server, which is a HAPI server. Patient Viewer, Server Query work ok. The Scenario Builder and Logical Modeller do not work. I get this error "{"msg":"No matching profile (http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CarePlan) found on https://fhir-qa.fmcna.com/STU3/fhirapi/StructureDefinition (but not a server error - just not present)"}" . Looks like I need a Structure Definition. What tools or processes can / should be used to crete the Structure Definitions? @James Agnew @ravi.kuchi @Manju Sampath
Also, what is the best way to (1) check for conformance of our HAPI server implementation with the Clinfhir features and (2) train a group of developers and business system analysts on Clinfhir.
You probably don't need to create the structure definitions, just load the ones from the FHIR STU3 downloads page. (Giving that as something to try while you wait for the experts :))
Thanks, I'll pull that in and see what happens next.
Yep - I think that's teh issue. Hapi has a utility that will do this for you - see this post for details: https://fhirblog.com/2016/10/19/setting-up-your-own-fhir-server-for-profiling/
btw - there's a separate stream for clinFHIR - sometimes questions can get lost in the implementers stream!

Hi David,
I'm in the same boat- just got introduced to the awesome clinFHIR! I do have a couple of questions but I don't see the separate stream for clinFHIR , just joined ZULIP and all I see under streams are #Announcements ,#implementers and #social
Thanks!
You're welcome :) There are a lot of streams now - those ones will at least get people started...

Hi! I have been trying to find some tools to study FHIR. I found clinfhir recently. Seems really good tool to get some sense at the beginning of my journey. I have been going trough some tutorials. I have been able to upload some patients with observations etc to server. I'm having some trouble with scenario builder. When I'm validating resources I get message: error Error null validating Coding. I still can upload resources. Seems pretty weird. Should I be worried about this error? Or is there some way to get rid of it. My job is at the moment to study FHIR and later on I should be able to start implementing FHIR to our software. I should be able to get out some patient records and measurements from our client made with Qt. In addition to this recent problem: If You have some tutorials or good tips or links for training and implementing in general that would be great!

HI Lauri, glad you're finding it helpful! Not sure what the error is - can you post a screenshot of the json (it's on the right pane, 'Current Resource Views', 'json' tab and I'll take a look. btw - there's a separate stream for clinFHIR that might be better to use (this stream gets a bit busy :) ) . https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/22-clinFHIR
